recipe_name: Fruit salad with long pepper cream
author: Tom Allcott
method: Whisk the cream until soft peaks form. Mix the spices and vanilla seeds together. Just before serving, fold the spice mixture into the cream,  reserving a little to sprinkle on top for aroma.  Dust with icing sugar, particularly if serving the cream with tart fruit such as plums or cherries.  Serve with summer fruits, peaches, nectarines, plums and/or cherries.
ingredients: 1 x 250ml pot of cream (or cr√®me fraiche) ,  4 tbsp brown sugar,  5 cardamom seeds, crushed,  1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped from the pod,  5 long pepper spikes, snapped, cracked and ground,  Mixed fresh fruit, to serve
